21-004SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting held Thursday, December 10, 2020.Chair Coffee spoke.A motion was made by Chair Coffee, seconded by Vice Chair Wheeler, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 5 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbstain: 3 - Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan and Eric RockAbsent: 2 - Alan Tolkoff and Coby Skye2.

21-001SC.summary: Recommendation to review and approve the draft letter on Commission policy priorities and forward to City Council.Chair Coffee spoke.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Coffee and Vice Chair Wheeler.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.Commissioner Gaytan spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Coffee and Commissioner Gaytan.Chair Coffee spoke.Page 2 of 7VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JANUARY 28, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESLarry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Coffee and Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Gaytan, seconded by Commissioner Rock, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbsent: 2 - Alan Tolkoff and Coby Skye3.

21-002SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation on the preliminary results of the Sustainable City Action Plan 10 Year Report.Commissioner Skye joined the meeting.Chair Coffee spoke.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, and Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Coffee spoke.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, spoke.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.Commissioner Rock spoke.Page 3 of 7VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JANUARY 28, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESLarry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Rock and Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.Commissioner Rock spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, spoke.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, and Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Chair Coffee spoke.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Coffee and Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist.A motion was made by Eric Rock, seconded by Hilda Gaytan, to approve recommendation. The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbsent: 1 - Alan Tolkoff4.
